GE07bhg4c01u:253: Śrīdhara: asmākam iti | nibodha budhyasva | nāyakā netāraḥ | saṃjñārthaṃ samyag jñānārtham ||7||
GE07bhg4c01u:254: Viśvanātha: nibodha budhyasva | saṃjñārthaṃ samyag jñānārtham ||7||
GE07bhg4c01u:256: tarhi kiṃ pāṇḍava-sainyād bhīto 'sīty ācārya-bhāvaṃ sambhāvyāntarjātām api bhītim ācchādayan dhārṣṭyenāha - asmākam iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:257: asmākaṃ sarveṣāṃ madhye ye viśiṣṭāḥ paramotkṛṣṭā budhyādi-bala-śālino nāyakā netāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:260: tadāpi bhīṣmādibhir mad-vijayaḥ setsyaty eveti tat kopotpādanārthaṃ dyotyam ||7||
GE07bhg4c01u:263: bhavān bhīṣmaś ca karṇaś ca kṛpaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:265: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:267: Śrīdhara: tān eṣāha bhavān iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c01u:271: anye ceti mad-arthe mat-prayojanārthaṃ jīvitaṃ tyaktum adhyavasitā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:272: nānā anekāni śastrāni praharaṇa-sādhanāni yeṣāṃ te |
GE07bhg4c01u:275: tyakta-jīvitā iti jīvita-tyāgenāpi yadi mad-upakāraḥ syāt tadā tad api kartuṃ pravṛttā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:276: vastutas tu mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvam eva nimitta-mātraṃ bhava savyasācin iti bhagavad-ukter duryodhana-sarasvatī satyam evāha sma || 8-9||
GE07bhg4c01u:282: nanv etāvanta eva mat-sainye viśiṣṭāḥ kintv asaṅkhyeyāḥ santīty āha anye ceti |
GE07bhg4c01u:284: tyaktety-ādi karmaṇi niṣṭhā jīvitāni tyaktuṃ kṛta-niścayā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:285: itthaṃ ca teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ mayi snehātirekāt śauryātirekād yuddha-pāṇḍityāc ca mad-vijayaḥ siddhyed eveti dyotyate ||8-9||
GE07bhg4c01u:289: paryāptaṃ tv idam eteṣāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam ||10||
GE07bhg4c01u:290: Śrīdhara: tataḥ kiṃ? ata āha - aparyāptam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:291: tat tathābhūtaiḥ vīrair yuktam api bhīṣmeṇābhirakṣitam api asmākaṃ balaṃ sainyaṃ aparyāptaṃ taiḥ saha yoddhuṃ asamarthaṃ bhāti |
GE07bhg4c01u:292: idam eteṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam sat paryāptaṃ samarthaṃ bhāti |
GE07bhg4c01u:296: pāṇḍavaiḥ saha yoddhuṃ akṣamam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:298: eteṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tu bhīmena sthūla-buddhinā śastra-śāstrānabhijño 'pi rakṣitam paryāptaṃ paripūrṇam |
GE07bhg4c01u:299: asmābhiḥ saha yuddhe pravīṇam ity arthaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c01u:301: nanv ubhayoḥ sainyayos taulyāt tavaiva vijayaḥ katham ity āśaṅkya sva-sainyādhikyam āha aparyāptam iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:304: eteṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ balaṃ tu paryāptaṃ parimitam |
GE07bhg4c01u:310: bhīṣmam evābhirakṣantu bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi ||11||
GE07bhg4c01u:312_0: tasmād yuṣmābhiḥ sāvadhānair bhavituvyam ity āha ayaneṣu vyūha-praveśa-mārgeṣu yathā-bhāgaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:312_1: vibhaktāḥ svāṃ svāṃ raṇa-bhūmim aparityajyaivāvasthitā bhavanto bhīṣmam evābhitas
GE07bhg4c01u:312_2: tathā rakṣantu yathānyair yudhyamāno 'yaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kaiścin na hanyate |
GE07bhg4c01u:315: athaivaṃ mad-ukti-bhāvaṃ vijñāyācāryaś ced udāsīta tadā mat-kārya-kṣatir iti vibhāvya tasmin sva-kārya-bhāram arpayann āha ayaneṣv iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:316_0: ayaneṣu sainya-praveśa-vartmasu yathābhāgaṃ vibhaktāṃ svāṃ svāṃ yuddha-bhūmim aparityajyāvasthitā
GE07bhg4c01u:316_1: bhavanto bhavad-ādayo bhīṣmame evābhito rakṣantu yuddhābhiniveśāt pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhataś
GE07bhg4c01u:316_2: cāpaśyantaṃ taṃ yathānyo na vihanyāt tathā kurvantv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:317: senāpatau bhīṣme nirbodhe mad-vijaya-siddhir iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:321: yāvakṣa-sadasi mad-anyāyaṃ vidantāv api draupadyā nyāyaṃ pṛṣṭau nāvocatāṃ mayā tu pāṇḍaveṣu pratītaṃ snehābhāsaṃ tyājayituṃ tathā niveditam iti ||11||
GE07bhg4c01u:326: Śrīdhara: tad evaṃ bahu-māna-yuktaṃ rāja-vākyaṃ śrutvā bhīṣmaḥ kiṃ kṛtavān |
GE07bhg4c01u:328: tasya rājño harṣaṃ kurvan pitāmaho bhīṣma uccair mahāntaṃ siṃha-nādaṃ vinadya kṛtvā śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau vāditavān ||12||
GE07bhg4c01u:330_0: tataś ca sva-saṃmāna-śravaṇa-janita-harṣas tasya duryodhanasya bhava-vidhvaṃsanena
GE07bhg4c01u:330_1: harṣaṃ sañanayituṃ kuru-vṛddho bhīṣmaḥ siṃha-nādam iti upamāne karmaṇi ceti ṇamul
GE07bhg4c01u:332: evaṃ duryodhana-kṛtāṃ sva-stutim avadhārya sa-harṣo bhīṣmas tad-antar-jātāṃ bhītim utsādayituṃ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmāv ity āha |
GE07bhg4c01u:333: siṃha-nādam ity upamāne karmaṇi ceti pāṇini-sūtrāt ṇamul |
GE07bhg4c01u:336: mukhataḥ kiñcid anuktvā śaṅkha-nāda-mātra-karaṇena jaya-parājayau khalv īśvarādhīnau tvad-arthe kṣatra-dharmeṇa dehaṃ tyakṣyāmīti vyajyate ||12||
GE07bhg4c01u:339: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānakagomukhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:342: tad evaṃ senāpateḥ bhīṣmasya yuddhotsavam ālokya sarvato yuddhotsavaḥ pravṛtta iy āha tata ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c01u:346: sa ca śaṅkhādi-śabdas tumulo mahān abhūt ||13||
GE07bhg4c01u:347: Viśvanātha: tataś cobhayatraiva yuddhotsāhaḥ pravṛtta ity āha tata iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:352: senāpatau bhīṣme pravṛtte tat-sainye sahasā tat-kṣaṇam eva śaṅkhādayo 'bhyahanyanta vāditāḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:355: sa śabdas tumula ekākāratayā mahān āsīt ||13||
GE07bhg4c01u:358: tataḥ śvetair hayair yukte mahati syandane sthitau |
GE07bhg4c01u:359: mādhavaḥ pāṇḍavaś caiva divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c01u:360: Śrīdhara: tataḥ pāṇḍava-sainye pravṛttaṃ yuddhotsāham āha tata ity ādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:361: tataḥ kaurava-sainya-vādya-kolāhalānantaraṃ mahati syandane rathe sthitau santau śrī-kṛṣṇārjunau divyau śaṅkhau prakarṣeṇa dadhmatur vādayāmāsatuḥ | ||12||
GE07bhg4c01u:363: Baladeva: atha pāṇḍava-sainye pravṛttaṃ yuddhosavam āha tata iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:364: anyeṣām api ratha-sthitatve saty api kṛṣṇārjunayoḥ ratha-sthitatvoktis tad-rathasyāgni-dattatvaṃ trailokya-vijetṛtvaṃ mahā-prabhavatvaṃ ca vyajyate ||14||
GE07bhg4c01u:371: kāśyaś ca parameṣvāsaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:374: saubhadraś ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak ||18||
GE07bhg4c01u:375: Śrīdhara: tad eva vibhāgena darśayann āha pāñcajanyam iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:378: vṛkavat udaraṃ yasya sa vṛkodaro mahā-śaṅkhaṃ pauṇḍraṃ dadhmāv iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:385: paramaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ iṣvāso dhanur yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:391: Baladeva: pāñcajanyam ity ādi pāñcajanyādayaḥ kṛṣṇādi-śaṅkhānām āhvayāḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:394: rājā bhīmakarmā dhanañjaya ity ebhir yudhiṣṭhirādīnāṃ rāja-sūya-yājitva-hiḍimbādi-nihantṛtva-digvijayāhṛtānanta-dhanatvāni ca vyajya pāṇḍava-senā-sūtkarṣaḥ sūcyate |
GE07bhg4c01u:401: pṛthivīpate he dhṛtarāṣṭreti tava durmantraṇodayaḥ kula-kṣaya-lakṣaṇo ' narthaḥ samāsata iti sūcyate ||15-18||
GE07bhg4c01u:405: nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo vyanunādayan ||19||
GE07bhg4c01u:406: Śrīdhara - sa ca śaṅkhānāṃ nādas tvadīyānāṃ mahābhayaṃ janayāmāsety āha sa ghoṣa ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:409: nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo 'bhyanunādayan pratidhvanibhir apūryan ||19||
GE07bhg4c01u:412: pāṇḍavaiḥ kṛtaḥ śaṅkha-nādo dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ bhīṣmādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ hṛṇḍayāṇi vyadārayat |
GE07bhg4c01u:414: tumulo 'titīvraḥ abhyanunādayan pratidhvanibhiḥ p”ryann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:415: dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ kṛtas tu śaṅkhādinādas tumulo 'pi teṣāṃ kiñcid api kṣobhaṃ nājanayat tathānukter iti bodhyam ||19||
GE07bhg4c01u:420: Śrīdhara - etasmin samaye śrī-kṛṣṇam arjuno vijñāpayāmāsety āha atha ity ādibhiḥ caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:424: Baladeva - evaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ yuddhe bhītiṃ pradarśya pāṇḍavānāṃ tu tatrotsāham āha atheti sārdhakena |
GE07bhg4c01u:425_1: dhārtarāṣṭrān bhīṣmādīn kapidhvajo 'rjuno yena śrī-dāśarather api mahānti kāryāni
GE07bhg4c01u:425_2: purā sādhitāni tena mahāvīreṇa dhvajam adhitiṣñhitā hanumatānugṛhīto bhaya-gandha-śūnya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:427: hṛṣīkeśam iti hṛṣīkeśaṃ sarvendriya-pravartakaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tad idaṃ vākyam uvāceti |
GE07bhg4c01u:428: sarveśvaro harir yeṣāṃ niyojyas teṣāṃ tad ekānta-bhaktānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ vijaye sandeha-gandho 'pi neti bhāvaḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c01u:431: hṛṣīkeśaṃ tadā vākyam idam āha mahīpate |
GE07bhg4c01u:432: senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṃ sthāpaya me 'cyuta ||21||
GE07bhg4c01u:434: kair mayā saha yoddhavyam asmin raṇasamudyame ||22||
GE07bhg4c01u:437: Śrīdhara - tad eva vākyam āha senayor ubhayor ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:439: nanu tvaṃ yoddhā na tu yuddha-prekṣakas tatrāha kair mayety ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:441: yotsyamānān iti dhārtarāṣṭrasya duryodhanasya priyaṃ kartum icchanto ye iha samāgatāḥ tān ahaṃ drakṣyāmi yāvat |
GE07bhg4c01u:442: tāvad ubhayoḥ senayor madhye me rathaṃ sthāpayety anvayaḥ ||21-23||
GE07bhg4c01u:445_0: he acyutedi svabhāva-siddhād bhakta-vātsalyāt pāramaiśvaryāc ca na cyavase smeti
GE07bhg4c01u:445_1: tena tena ca niyantirto bhaktasya me vākyāt tatra rathaṃ sthitaṃ kuru nirbhaya tatra
GE07bhg4c01u:446: yoddhu-kāmān na tu sahāsmābhiḥ sandhiṃ cikīrṣūn |
GE07bhg4c01u:448: nanu tvaṃ yoddhā, na tu yuddha-prekṣakas tatas tad-darśanena kim iti cet tatrāha kair iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:449: asmin bandhūnām eva mitho raṇodyoge kair bandhubhiḥ saha mama yuddhaṃ bhāvīty etaj-jñānāyaivaa madhye ratha-sthāpanam iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:450: nanu bandhutvād eet sandhim eva vidhātsyantīti cet tatrāha yotsyamānān iti na tu sandhiṃ vidhāsyataḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:452: durbuddheḥ kudhiyaḥ svajīvanopāyānabhijñasya yuddhe na tu durbuddhy-apanayane |
GE07bhg4c01u:459: uvāca pārtha paśyaitān samavetān kurūn iti ||25||
GE07bhg4c01u:461: ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam ukta ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:462: uḍākā nidrā tasya īśena jita-nidreṇa arjunena evam uktaḥ san |
GE07bhg4c01u:463: he bhārata, he dhṛtarāṣṭra senayor madhye rathānām uttamaṃ rathaṃ hṛṣīkeśaḥ sthāpitavān |
GE07bhg4c01u:464: bhīṣma-droṇa iti mahīkṣitāṃ rājñāṃ ca pramukhataḥ sammukhe rathaṃ sthāpayitvā |
GE07bhg4c01u:465: he pārtha etān kurūn paśyeti śrī-bhagavān uvāca ||24-25||
GE07bhg4c01u:467: arjuna-vāg-indriya-mātreṇāpi niyamyo 'bhūd ity aho prea-vaśyatvaṃ bhagavata iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:468: guḍākeśena guḍā yathā mādhurya-mātra-prakāśakās tat tathā svīya-sneha-rasāsvāda-prakāśakā akeśā viṣṇu-brahma-śivā yasya tena akāro viṣṇuḥ ko brahmā īśo mahā-devaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:469: yatra sarvāvatāri-cūḍāmaṇīndraḥ svayaṃ bhagavān śrī-kṛṣṇa eva premādhīnaḥ sann ājñānuvartī babhūva |
GE07bhg4c01u:470: tatra guṇāvatāratvāt tad-aṃśāḥ viṣṇu-brahma-rudrāḥ katham aiśvaryaṃ prakāśayantu |
GE07bhg4c01u:471: kintu svakartṛkaṃ sneha-rasaṃ prakāśyaiva svaṃ svaṃ kṛtārthaṃ manyanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:472: yad uktaṃ śrī-bhagavatā para-vyoma-nāthenāpi dvijātmamajā me yuvayor didṛkṣuṇā iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:473: yad vā, guḍāko nidrā tasyā īśena jita-nidrenety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:474: atrāpi vyākhyāyāṃ sākṣān māyāyā api niyantā yaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ sa cāpi yena premṇā vijitya vaśīkṛtas tenārjunena māyā-vṛttir nidrā varākī jiteti kiṃ citram iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:475: bhīṣma-droṇayoḥ pramukhataḥ pramukhe sammukhe sarveṣāṃ mahīkṣitāṃ rājñāṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c01u:477: Baladeva: tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjayaḥ prāha evam iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:478_1: tat-parama-bhaktas tenārjunenaivam uktaḥ pravartito hṛṣīkeśas tac-citta-vṛtty-abhijño
GE07bhg4c01u:478_2: bhagavān senayor madhye bhīṣma-droṇayoḥ sarveṣāṃ ca mahīkṣitāṃ bhū-bhujāṃ ca pramukhataḥ
GE07bhg4c01u:478_3: sammukhe rathottamaṃ agnidattaṃ rathaṃ sthāpayitvovāca he pārtha samavetān etān kurūn paśyeti |
GE07bhg4c01u:479_0: pārtha-hṛṣīkeśa-śabdābhyām idaṃ sūcyate matipitṛ-svasṛ-putratvāt tvat-sārathyam ahaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:479_1: kariṣyāmy eva tvaṃ tv adhunaiva yuyutsāṃ tyakṣyasīti kiṃ śatru-sainya-vīkṣaṇeneti
GE07bhg4c01u:482: tatrāpaśyat sthitān pārthaḥ pitṝn atha pitāmahān |
GE07bhg4c01u:483: ācāryān mātulān bhrātṝn putrān pautrān sakhīṃs tathā ||
GE07bhg4c01u:484: śvaśurān suhṛdaś caiva senayor ubhayor api ||26||
GE07bhg4c01u:485: Śrīdhara: tataḥ kiṃ pravṛttam ity āha tatrety ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:487: putrān pautrān iti duryodhanādīnāṃ ye putrāḥ pautrāś ca tān ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:490: Viśvanātha: duryodhanādīnāṃ ye putrāḥ pautrāś ca tān |
GE07bhg4c01u:491: Baladeva: evaṃ bhagavatokto 'rjunaḥ para-senām apaśyad ity āha tatreti sārdhakena |
GE07bhg4c01u:503: ubhayor api senayor avasthitān tān sarvān samīkṣyety anvayāt ||26||
GE07bhg4c01u:506: tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥ sarvān bandhūn avasthitān |
GE07bhg4c01u:508: Śrīdhara: tataḥ kiṃ kṛtavān ity āha tān iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:509: senayor ubhayor evaṃ samīkṣya kṛpayā mahatyā āviṣṭaḥ viṣaṇṇaḥ san idam arjuno 'bravīt |
GE07bhg4c01u:514_0: atha sarveśvaro dayāluḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saparikarātmopadeśena viśvam uddidhīrṣur arjunaṃ śiṣyaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:514_1: kartuṃ tat-sva-dharme 'pi yuddhe mā hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtāni iti śruty-arthābhāsenādharmatām
GE07bhg4c01u:514_2: ābhāsya taṃ saṃmohaṃ kṛtavān ity āha tān samīkṣyate kaunteya iti svīya-pitṛ-svasṛ-putratvoktyā
GE07bhg4c01u:518: aparayeti vā cchedaḥ sva-sainye pūrvam api kṛpāsti para-sainye tv aparāpi sābhūd ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:524: sīdanti mama gātrāṇi mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati ||28||
GE07bhg4c01u:525: vepathuś ca śarīre me romaharṣaś ca jāyate |
GE07bhg4c01u:526: gāṇḍīvaṃ sraṃsate hastāt tvak caiva paridahyate ||29||
GE07bhg4c01u:527: Śrīdhara: kim abravīd ity apekṣāyām āha dṛṣṭvemān ity ādi yāvad adhyāya-samāpti |
GE07bhg4c01u:528: he kṛṣṇa yoddhum icchataḥ purataḥ samavasthitān svajanān bandhu-janān dṛṣṭvā madīyāni gātrāṇi karacaraṇādīni sīdanti viśīryante |
GE07bhg4c01u:535: Baladeva: kaunteyaḥ śoka-vyākulaṃ yad āha tad anuvadati dṛṣṭvemam iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:536: svajanaṃ sva-bandhu-vargaṃ jātāv eka-vacanaṃ sa-gotra-bāndhava-jñāti-bandhu-sva-svajanāḥ samāḥ ity amaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:537: dṛṣṭvāsavthitasya mama gātrāṇi kara-caraṇādīni sīdanti śīryante pariśuṣyatīti śramādi-hetukāc choṣād atiśayitvam asya śoṣasya vyajyate |
GE07bhg4c01u:543: na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:545: Śrīdhara: api ca na śaknomīty ādi | viparītāni nimittāni aniṣṭa-sūcakāni śakunāni paśyāmi ||30||
GE07bhg4c01u:547: viparītāni nimittāni dhana-nimittako 'yam atra me vāsa itivan nimitta-śabdo 'yaṃ prayojana-vācī |
GE07bhg4c01u:548: tataś ca yuddhe vijayino mama rājya-lābhāt sukhaṃ na bhaviṣyati,
GE07bhg4c01u:549: kintu tad-viparītam anutāpa-duḥkham eva bhāvīty arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c01u:550: Baladeva: api ceti avasthātuṃ sthiro bhavituṃ mano bhramtīva ceti daurbalya-mūrcchayor udayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:551: nimittāni phalāny atra yuddhe viparītāni paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c01u:552: vijayino me rājya-prāptir ānando na bhaviṣyati kintu tad-viparīto 'nutāpa eva bhāvīti |
GE07bhg4c01u:553: nimitta-śabdaḥ phala-vācī kasmai nimittāyātra vasasi ity ādau tathā pratīteḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c01u:556: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave |
GE07bhg4c01u:557: na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ kṛṣṇa na ca rājyaṃ sukhāni ca ||31||
GE07bhg4c01u:558: Śrīdhara: kiṃ ca na cety ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:559: āhave yuddhe svajanaṃ hatvā śreyaḥ phalaṃ na paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c01u:560: vijayādikaṃ phalaṃ kiṃ na paśyasīti cet tatrāha na kāṅkṣa iti ||31||
GE07bhg4c01u:561: Viśvanātha: śreyo na paśyāmīti dvāv imau puruṣau loke sūrya-maṇḍala-bhedinau |
GE07bhg4c01u:562: parivrāḍ yoga-yuktaś ca raṇe cābhimukhe hataḥ ||
GE07bhg4c01u:564: hantus tu na kim ap sukṛtam |
GE07bhg4c01u:565: nana dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ yaśo rājyaṃ vartate yuddhasyety ata āha na kāṅkṣa iti ||31||
GE07bhg4c01u:566: Baladeva: evaṃ tattva-jñāna-pratikūlaṃ śokam uktvā tat-pratikūlāṃ viparīta-buddhim āha na ceti |
GE07bhg4c01u:567: āhave svajanaṃ hatvā śreyo naiva paśyāmīti |
GE07bhg4c01u:569: parivrāḍ yoga-yuktaś ca raṇe cābhimukhe hataḥ ||
GE07bhg4c01u:570: ity ādinā hatasya śreyaḥ-smaraṇāt hantur me na kiñcic chreyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:571: asvajanam iti vā cchedaḥ asvajana-vadhe 'pi śreyaso 'bhāvāt svajana-vadhe punaḥ kutastarāṃ tad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:572: nanu yaśo-rājya-lābho dṛṣṭaṃ phalam astīti cet tatrāha na kāṅkṣa iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:573: rājyādi-spṛhā-virahād upāye vijaye mama pravṛttir na yuktā, randhane yathā bhojanechā-virahiṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:577: kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā |
GE07bhg4c01u:578: yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitaṃ no rājyaṃ bhogāḥ sukhāni ca ||32||
GE07bhg4c01u:579: ta ime 'vasthitā yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā dhanāni ca |
GE07bhg4c01u:580: ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrās tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ ||33||
GE07bhg4c01u:581: mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ śyālāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā |
GE07bhg4c01u:582: etān na hantum icchāmi ghnato 'pi madhusūdana ||34||
GE07bhg4c01u:583: api trailokyarājyasya hetoḥ kiṃ nu mahīkṛte |
GE07bhg4c01u:584: nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāj janārdana ||35|||
GE07bhg4c01u:585: Śrīdhara: etad eva prapañcayati kiṃ no rājyena ity ādi sārdha-dvayena |
GE07bhg4c01u:587: yad-artham asmākaṃ rājyādikam apekṣitam te ete prāṇa-dhanāni tyaktvā tyāgam aṅgīkṛtya yuddhārtham avasthitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:588: ataḥ kim asmākaṃ rājyādibhiḥ kṛtyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:589: nanu yadi kṛpayā tvam etān na haṃsi tarhi tvām ete rājya-lobhena haniṣyanty eva |
GE07bhg4c01u:590: atas tvam evaitān hatvā rājyaṃ bhuṅkṣveti |
GE07bhg4c01u:594: trailokya-rājyasyāpi hetoḥ tat-prāpty-artham api hantuṃ necchāmi |
GE07bhg4c01u:598: gāḥ sarvendriya-vṛttīḥ vindasīti tvam eva me manogataṃ pratīhīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:600: prāṇān prāṇāśāṃ dhanāni9 dhanāśām iti laksaṇayā bodhyam |
GE07bhg4c01u:601: sva-prāṇa-vyaye 'pi sva-bandhu-sukhārthā rājya-spṛhā syāt teṣām apy atra nāśa-prāpter apārthaiva yuddhe pravṛttir iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:602: nanu tvaṃ cet kāruṇikas etān na hanyās tarhi te sva-rājyaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ kartuṃ tvām eva hanyur iti cet tatrāh etān iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:603: māṃ ghnato 'pi hiṃsato 'py etān hantum ahaṃ necchāmi |
GE07bhg4c01u:605: nanv anvayān hitvā dhṛtarāṣṭra-putrā eva hantavyā,
GE07bhg4c01u:606: bahu-duḥkha-dātṝṇāṃ teṣāṃ ghāte sukha-sambhavād iti cet tatrāha nihatyeti |
GE07bhg4c01u:607: dhārtarāṣṭrān duryodhanādīn nihatya sthitānāṃ naḥ pāṇḍāvānāṃ kā prītiḥ prasannatā syān na kāpīti acira-sukhābhāsa-spṛhayā ciratara-naraka-hetu-bhrāṛho na yogya iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:608: he janārdaneti yady ete hantavyās tarhi bhūbhārāpahārī tvam eva tān hahi pareśasya te pāpa-gandha-sambandho na bhaved iti vyajyate ||32-35||
GE07bhg4c01u:612: tasmān nārhā vayaṃ hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān svabāndhavān |
GE07bhg4c01u:613: svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava ||36||
GE07bhg4c01u:614: Śrīdhara: nanu ca agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:615: kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c01u:616: iti smaraṇād agni-dāhādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir hetubhir ete tāvad ātatāyinaḥ ātatāyināṃ ca vadho yukta eva |
GE07bhg4c01u:618: nātatāyi-vadhe doṣo hantur bhavati kaścana || iti vacanāt |
GE07bhg4c01u:622: yathoktaṃ yājñavalkyena smṛtyor virodhe nyāyas tu balavān vyavahārataḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:623: artha-śāstrāt tu balavān dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ ||
GE07bhg4c01u:625: tasmād ātatāyinām apy eteṣām ācāryādīnāṃ vadhe 'smākaṃ pāpam eva bhavet |
GE07bhg4c01u:626: anyāyyatvād adharmatvāc caitad vadhasya amutra ceha vā na sukhaṃ syād ity āha svajanam iti ||36||
GE07bhg4c01u:627: Viśvanātha: nanu agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:628: kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c01u:632: ity ādi-vacanād eṣāṃ vadha ucita eveti |
GE07bhg4c01u:635: ātatāyinam āyāntam ity ādikam artha-śāstraṃ dharma-śāstrāt durbalam |
GE07bhg4c01u:636: yad uktaṃ yājñavalkyena artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti smṛtam ||
GE07bhg4c01u:638: tasmād ācāryādīnāṃ vadhe pāpaṃ syād eva |
GE07bhg4c01u:639: na caihikaṃ sukham api syād ity āha svajanam iti ||36||
GE07bhg4c01u:640: Baladeva: nanu agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:641: kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c01u:644: ity ukter eṣāṃ ṣaḍ-vidhyenātatāyināṃ yukto vadha iti cet tatrāha pāpam iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:645: etān hatvā sthitān asmān pāpam eva bandhu-kṣaya-hetukam āśrayet |
GE07bhg4c01u:646: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ ātatāyinam āyāntam ity ādikam artha-śāstraṃ mā hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtāni iti dharma-śāstrāt durbalam |
GE07bhg4c01u:647: artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ ||
GE07bhg4c01u:649: tasmād durbalārtha-śāstra-balena pūjyānāṃ droṇa-bhīṣmādīnāṃ vadhaḥ pāpa-hetur eveti |
GE07bhg4c01u:650: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmīty ārabhyoktam upasaṃharati tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:653: na hi gurubhir bandhu-janaiś ca vināsmākaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:655: he mādhaveti śrīpatis tvam aśrīke yuddhe kathaṃ pravartayasiīti bhāvaḥ ||36||
GE07bhg4c01u:658: yady apy ete na paśyanti lobhopahata-cetasaḥ |
GE07bhg4c01u:660: kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum |
GE07bhg4c01u:663: nanu tavaiteṣām api bandhu-vadha-doṣe samāne sati yathaivaite bandhu-vadha-doṣam aṅgīkṛtyāpi yuddhe pravartate |
GE07bhg4c01u:664: tathaiva bhavān api pravartatāṃ kim anena viṣādenety ata āha yadyapīti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c01u:665: rājya-lobhenopahataṃ bhraṣṭa-vivekaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ te ete duryodhanādayo yadyapi doṣaṃ na paśyanti,
GE07bhg4c01u:666: tathāpi asmābhir doṣaṃ prapaśyadbhir asmāt pāpāt nivartituṃ kathaṃ na jñeyaṃ nivṛttāv eva buddhiḥ kartavyety arthaḥ ||37-38||
GE07bhg4c01u:667: Viśvanātha: nanv ete tarhi kathaṃ yuddhe vartante | tatrāha yadyapīti ||37-38||
GE07bhg4c01u:669: nanu āhūto na nivarteta dyūtād api raṇād api viditaṃ kṣatriyasyeti kṣatra-dharma-smaraṇāt tair āhūtānāṃ bhavatāṃ yuddhe pravṛttir yukteti cet tatrāha yadyapīhi dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c01u:670: pāpe pravṛttau lobhas teṣāṃ hetur asmākaṃ tu lobha-virahān na tatra pravṛttir iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:675: tathā ca śyenenābhicaran yajeta ity ādi śāstrokte 'pi śyenādāv ivāniṣṭānubandhitvād yuddhe 'smin naḥ pravṛttir na yukteti |
GE07bhg4c01u:676: āhūta ity ādi śāstraṃ tu kula-kṣaya-doṣaṃ vinā bhūta-viṣayaṃ bhāvi |
GE07bhg4c01u:681: dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmo 'bhibhavaty uta ||39||
GE07bhg4c01u:682: Śrīdhara: tam eva doṣaṃ darśayati kula-kṣaya ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:684: uta api avaśiṣṭaṃ kṛtsnam api kulam adharmo 'bhibhavati vyāpnotīty arthaḥ ||39||
GE07bhg4c01u:686: kula-kṣaya iti sanātanāḥ kula-parasparā-prāptatvena bahu-kālataḥ prāptā ity arthaḥ ||39||
GE07bhg4c01u:687: Baladeva: doṣam eva prapañcayati kula-kṣaya iti |
GE07bhg4c01u:688: kula-dharmāḥ kulocitā agni-hotrādayo dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ kula-paraspara-prāptāḥ praṇaśyanti kartur vināśāt |
GE07bhg4c01u:689: utety apy arthe kṛtsnam ity anena sambadhyate |
GE07bhg4c01u:690: dharme naṣṭe saty avaśiṣṭaṃ bālādi-kṛtsnam api kulam adharmo 'bhibhavati satīty arthaḥ ||39||
GE07bhg4c01u:695: Śrīdhara: tataś ca adharmābhibhavād ity ādi ||40||
GE07bhg4c01u:696: Viśvanātha: praduṣyantīti | adharma eva tā vyabhicāre pravartayatīti bhāvaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c01u:698: asmad-bhartṛbhir dharmam ullaṅghya yathā̆akula-kṣaya-lakṣaṇe pāpe vartitaṃ,
GE07bhg4c01u:699: tathāsmābhiḥ pātivratyam avajñāya durācāre vartitavyam iti durbuddhi-hatāḥ kula-striyaḥ praduṣyeyur ity arthaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c01u:704: Śrīdhara: evaṃ sati saṅkara ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:706: hi yasmāt luptāḥ piṇḍodaka-kriyā yeṣāṃ te tathā |
GE07bhg4c01u:708: Baladeva: kulasya saṅkaraḥ kula-ghnānāṃ narakāyaiveti yojanā |
GE07bhg4c01u:709: na kevalaṃ kula-ghnā eva narake patanti, kintu tat-pitaro 'pīty āha patantīti hir hetau |
GE07bhg4c01u:710: paṇḍādi dātṝṇāṃ putrādīnām abhāvād vilupta-piṇḍādi-kriyā santas te narakāyaiva patanti ||41||
GE07bhg4c01u:715: Śrīdhara: ukta-doṣam upasaṃharati doṣair iti dvābhyāṃ |
GE07bhg4c01u:717: jāti-dharmā varṇa-dharmāḥ kula-dharmāś ceti ca-kārād āśrama-dharmādayo 'pi gṛhyante ||42||
GE07bhg4c01u:719: Baladeva: ukta-doṣam upasaṃharati doṣair iti dvābhyāṃ |
GE07bhg4c01u:729: utsannāḥ kula-dharmā yeṣām iti utsanna-jāti-dharmānām apy upalakṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c01u:743: aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam |
GE07bhg4c01u:745: Śrīdhara: bandhu-vadhādhyavasāyena santy upamāne āha aho batetyādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:746: svajanaṃ hantum udyatā iti yat etan-mahat-pāpaṃ kartum adhyavasāyaṃ kṛtavanto vayam |
GE07bhg4c01u:747: aho bata mahat kaṣṭam ity arthaḥ ||44||
GE07bhg4c01u:749: Baladeva: bandhu-vadhādhyavasāyenāpi pāpaṃ sambhāvyānupapannāha aho iti | bateti sandehe ||44||
GE07bhg4c01u:753: dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṃ bhavet ||45||
GE07bhg4c01u:754: Śrīdhara: evaṃ santaptaḥ san mṛtyum evāśaṃsamāna āha yadi mām ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:755: apratīkāraṃ tuṣṇīm upaviṣṭaṃ māṃ yadi haniṣyanti tarhi tad-dhananaṃ mama kṣemataram atyantaṃ hitaṃ bhavet pāpāniṣpatteḥ ||45||
GE07bhg4c01u:758: nanu tvayi bandhu-vadhād vinivṛtte 'pi bhīṣmādibhir yuddhotsukais tva-vadhaḥ syād eva tataḥ kiṃ vidheyam iti cet tatrāha yadi mām ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:761: bhīṣmādayas tu na tat-pāpa-phalaṃ prāpsyanty eveti bhāvaḥ ||45||
GE07bhg4c01u:766: Śrīdhara: tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam uktvety ādi |
GE07bhg4c01u:767: saṅkhye saṅgrāme rathopasthe rathasyopari upāviśat upaviveśa |
GE07bhg4c01u:768: śokena saṃvignaṃ prakampitaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yasya saḥ ||46||
GE07bhg4c01u:774: Baladeva: tataḥ kim abhūd ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam utveti |
GE07bhg4c01u:775: saṅkhye yuddhe rathopasthe rathopari upāviśat upaviveśa |
